title: Bearded Person
description:
A person with a beard.

This emoji may be used to talk about bearded people in a gender-inclusive way. It was approved in 2017. Gendered variants of this emoji were approved three years later.

Variants include ğŸ§”‍â™‚ï¸ Man with a Beard and ğŸ§”‍â™€ï¸ Woman with a Beard, both approved in 2020.
apple_vendor_description: The man with beard emoji on Apple devices showcases a distinguished gentleman with a full, well-defined beard. Its Apple design features realistic lighting that accentuates the texture of the beard, giving it a soft yet substantial look, all within a smooth, rounded facial structure. The overall impression is one of maturity, wisdom, or a classic masculine aesthetic, often used to represent a person with facial hair or a generally more traditional male figure.
